localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 55 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续55天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續55天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/w4TcwPL868。

next.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
next.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts

localize.description: Alertly是您个性化的Slack机器人，用于获取JIRA提醒。设置重要的提醒，这些提醒是可操作的和个性化的，以便正确的人得到通知，所有这些都来自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您个性化的JIRA警报懒惰机器人

localize.description: Alertly是您個性化的Slack機器人，用於獲取JIRA提醒。設置重要的提醒，這些提醒是可操作的和個性化的，以便正確的人得到通知，所有這些都來自Slack!
